entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 12:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -18.1°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
